hero.title: Seamlessly Connect All Your Business Integrations
hero.subtitle: Unify your workflows with our powerful integration platform. Connect, manage, and scale your business tools in one centralized hub.

support.title: How can we help you?
support.subtitle: Get the support you need to make the most of SyncRivo. Our team is here to help you succeed.
support.live_chat_desc: Get instant help from our support team
support.contact_form_subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us a detailed message and we'll get back to you quickly.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Connect with other users, share experiences, and get help from our community.
community.discord_desc: Join our Discord server for real-time discussions and community support.
community.forums_desc: Browse our community forums for questions, tips, and best practices.
community.github_desc: Contribute to our open source projects and report issues.

footer.tagline: Seamlessly connect and manage all your business integrations in one unified platform.
